## Public Member Functions

### executePostLayoutBinding() {#ab87e4c8db9b27d73e37e32708626054d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void WinCOFFObjectWriter::executePostLayoutBinding (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Perform any late binding of symbols (for example, to assign symbol indices for use when generating relocations).

This routine is called by the assembler after layout and relaxation is complete.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcwincoffobjectwriter-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcwincoffobjectwriter-h">MCWinCOFFObjectWriter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/wincoffobjectwriter-cpp/#l01193">1193</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/wincoffobjectwriter-cpp">WinCOFFObjectWriter.cpp</a>.

### recordRelocation() {#a25ccd828a9ce444bcfcb33af6b1ffb37}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void WinCOFFObjectWriter::recordRelocation (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> &#42; Fragment, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> Target, uint64&#95;t &amp; FixedValue)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> a relocation entry.

This routine is called by the assembler after layout and relaxation, and post layout binding. The implementation is responsible for storing information about the relocation so that it can be emitted during <a href="#ad87ce335279ff45eb851ff011b74dc9a">writeObject()</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcwincoffobjectwriter-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcwincoffobjectwriter-h">MCWinCOFFObjectWriter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/wincoffobjectwriter-cpp/#l01199">1199</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/wincoffobjectwriter-cpp">WinCOFFObjectWriter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### writeObject() {#ad87ce335279ff45eb851ff011b74dc9a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t WinCOFFObjectWriter::writeObject (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Write the object file and returns the number of bytes written.

This routine is called by the assembler after layout and relaxation is complete, fixups have been evaluated and applied, and relocations generated.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcwincoffobjectwriter-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcwincoffobjectwriter-h">MCWinCOFFObjectWriter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/wincoffobjectwriter-cpp/#l01208">1208</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/wincoffobjectwriter-cpp">WinCOFFObjectWriter.cpp</a>.
